#summary Setup of a blank project and development of comparator's driver using an external button to trigger the comparator during development and experimental phases

= Introduction =

Here are described the setup of a blank project, the hardware to test the comparator (a button and a simple debouncing RC circuit) and the development of the comparator's driver.
